name: BeatShot (OrbinWaffle)
description:
Joshua Lai: Project lead, programmer, level designer, musician

Isaac Diaz: Programmer, UI design

Jonathan Castersen: Programmer, 3d Modeler

Charlatan's Teahouse: Musician

A simple rhythm game where you play a little ball with a little cannon trying to defend yourself from assorted baddies. Careful though; your own shots will ricochet around the level and are dangerous to you too. Shoot at approaching enemies, dodge their attacks, and most importantly, stay in sync with the music!

Note that the web version is less stable. The downloadable is a little better.
